articles.title: Mission to counter conspiracy to alter demography soon: PM Modi
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced that the government is preparing to launch a mission to thwart a conspiracy to alter the demography of border areas with the help of infiltrators. He stated that those harboring infiltrators are conspiring to change the demography of areas bordering Bangladesh.

articles.title: Charlie Kirk killing: What we know about suspect Tyler Robinson's motives
articles.description: The Governor of Utah, Spencer Cox, stated that the suspect in the killing of conservative activist Charlie Kirk, Tyler Robinson, is not cooperating with investigators. Authorities are interviewing friends and family to determine a motive for the shooting. Robinson, 22, is in custody and is expected to be formally charged.

articles.title: Supreme Court refuses to stay Waqf (Amendment) Act 2025 in its entirety
articles.description: The Supreme Court of India declined to stay the entire Waqf (Amendment) Act, 2025, stating that laws passed by the legislature are presumed to be constitutional. The court noted that a stay is granted only in rare cases and that the current case did not warrant a complete stay of the statute.
